title: Overview
description: **Version 4 of the Flutter SDK is implemented in Flutter and supports development on all Flutter platforms**. To learn more about upgrading, read [Flutter SDK 3.x to 4.0 migration guide](/docs/sdk/client-side/flutter/migration-3-to-4). **Version 3 of the Flutter SDK introduces optional automatic collection of environment attributes**. To learn more about upgrading, read [Flutter SDK 2.x to 3.0 migration guide](/docs/sdk/client-side/flutter/migration-2-to-3).
